headline: Tucker Carlson Is Not Your New Best Friend
abstract: The Fox News host’s antiwar stance doesn’t erase all that other ugliness.
lead_paragraph: Suddenly you’re digging him. At least a little bit. I know, I’ve seen the tweets, read the commentary, heard the chatter, detected the barely suppressed cheer: Hurrah for Tucker Carlson. If only we had more brave, principled Republicans like him.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
